title: What happens when Pros have Maphacks TO PROVE A POINT? (No fog of war mod) | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged StarCraft 2 pros to play with MAPHACKS on & to play with 50% hit points on everything. Special claims that Protoss is OP in any of these challenges. Lets see how his Protoss goes against Astrea's Terran to settle this balance debate! -- üê∑ Second Channel for
